definition: (bird species of China) blue eared pheasant (Crossoptilon auritum)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The results showed that the heart of the Crossoptilon auritum is supplied by left and right coronary arteries.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，藍馬雞的心臟由左右冠狀動脈營養。
